name: Pollo Del Desierto
description:
What is Pollo Del Desierto?

Pollo Del Desierto is an isometric puzzle plat-former where you play as a pigeon courier task to deliver a package to a small town called murder.

After some minor convincing you decide to take it into your own wings and help the town out on it's water shortage, but whilst doing so find the owner of the package that has mysteriously disappeared seemingly down the old well... 

Play through

Credits 

Charlie Wardman
